name: Don't Find the Orb
description:
The Orb wants to be your friend. He's teleported you to his dimension just so you two can meet and be BFFs. 

YOU MUST AVOID THIS. 

Find the elevator button that takes you away before he finds you or you find him. He will drain your patience and drive you insane.  The good news is that he hates Cherry Tea.  You're armed with a tea pot, so you can shoot Cherry Tea drops at him to push him away when he's vulnerable.

I am creating this game simply to learn UE4.  Presently, it only has one level and an easy one at that.  I do plan on adding levels, tougher puzzles and even cut scenes as I learn UE4.

If you wish to donate, fine, but to be honest, I would prefer to have criticisms, ideas, thoughts, suggestions even more than money.  Feel free to contact me.

Please enjoy and please know that I mean no insult or offense to anyone in this game. 

Thank you.
